title: Whisk Up These 5 DIY Hacks To Remove Facial Hair
text:
facebook 204 SHARES 
Getting rid of hair can literally be a task; especially when you dread the pain that comes with threading or waxing, and also when you don't have the time to visit your parlour didi . But, then what do you do with that unibrow waiting to happen, and your ever burgeoning moustache? Well, believe it or not there are ingredients in your kitchen that can help you get rid of facial hair. Yes, you read that right. Try these hacks to remove your peach fuzz at home. Banana and oatmeal scrub 
It's a well-known fact that banana and oatmeal are both excellent natural cleansers. In a bowl, mash a banana into paste and stir in 2 tablespoons of oatmeal. Massage on your peach fuzz for 15-20 minutes using circular motions. Wash off with water. Repeat twice weekly. Chickpea flour mask 
In a bowl, mix half a cup of chickpea flour, 1 teaspoon of turmeric powder, 1 teaspoon of fresh cream, and half a cup of milk. Apply to the affected area and leave it on for 20-30 minutes. Rub gently in the opposite direction of hair growth, and rinse with lukewarm water. For best results, use this pack at least twice a week. Egg and corn flour mask 
Mix one egg with 1 tablespoon of sugar and one and a half teaspoon of corn flour to form a paste. Flour has the quality to remove hair from the roots. Apply to the face and let it dry for 15-20 minutes. Peel the mask off slowly, and carefully. Repeat it thrice a week for best results. Papaya and turmeric mask 
In a bowl, mix 2 tablespoon of papaya paste, half a teaspoon of turmeric powder, and 3 tablsepoons of aloe vera gel to form a paste. Apply the paste to the area of unwanted hair growth. Leave it on for 20 minutes until dry. Remove this by rubbing in the opposite direction of the hair growth. Honey and lemon mask 
Mix the juice of an entire lemon to 1 tablespoon of honey, to form a smooth paste. Apply the mixture to the affected area, and keep it on for 20-25 minutes. This will help lighten unwanted hair, as lemon has bleaching properties, and honey will help in removing the hair from the follicle.
